title: Jude Law's former lover Catherine Harding to star in BBC's The Voice
text:

Jude Law’s ex Catherine Harding has revealed she will compete in talent show The Voice.

Harding, also known as Cat Cavelli, 28, had his baby, Ada, after they split.

She reportedly met The New Pope actor while he was filming on location.

But after their break-up she stopped singing to focus on bringing up Ada, now four.

Catherine said: “It’s taken me quite a while to say ­actually, I am going to do something again.”

She added: “He’s been quite supportive.”

(Image: WireImage)

Law, 46, has four other children and Catherine said he takes daughter Ada to see them regularly.

The Voice 2020 is expected to be broadcast on ITV from January.
description: EXCLUSIVE: The New Pope star has given the singer-songwriter his blessing
